committees.name: Website and Payments
committees.description: Committee Head to handle our website, setting up Zelle and Apple Pay (including QR code) to allow additional options to pay Annual HOA dues.

committees.name: Dues and Collections
committees.description: Committee Head to handle Dues Notices, Collections and Managing HOA Banking.

committees.name: Spring Block Party
committees.description: Committee Head to handle the Spring Block-Party.

committees.name: Island Special Projects
committees.description: Committee Head to handle Island Special Projects, including ordering additional Police Officers for Halloween.

committees.name: Security and Guard House
committees.description: Committee Head to handle Security Guard House and interaction between the City and Security Company.

committees.name: Special Taxing District
committees.description: Committee Head to handle Annual Special Taxing District Budget Negotiations with the City of Miami Beach.
